id:
China Airshow shows J-20 with missile bay open and new missiles
NextBigFuture.com
paragraph:
China showed off four J-20 stealth fighters during the last day of the 12th Zhuhai Air Show. Two of the stealth fighters opened their weapons bay to show four medium-range air-to-air missiles and two close-range combat missiles.They also had a separate ground display of new Pili-10E air to air missiles.The claim is the new missiles are comparable to US AIM-9X missiles.
